labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Context menu appears way too far up, going out of view if the channel is near the top of the server
data.expected_result: Context menu appears next to where you right-clicked
data.short_description: Right-click context menus appear way too far up
data.steps_to_repro: - Right-click a server far down in your server list (it takes me 11 servers down to trigger this, but it may take you more or less) to open its Context Menu - Now Right-click on a channel to have its Context Menu appear
